rationale: Channa amphibeus is known from the type locality (Chel River, India) and from the Brahmaputra, and may also be present in Bhutan. It is assessed currently assessed as Least Concern, however further research is required on the species distribution and threats, and the records from Bhutan require confirmation.
evaluator: Jha, B.R., Datta, N.C., Britz, R., Dey, S.C., Vishwanath, W. & Allen, D.J.
